availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of Charles Bodkin. Resident of Ballard County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Picketts District, p. 621-622.
Thomas M. Bodkin, "Bodkin," in Ballard and Carlisle Counties History, Volume I, ed. Ballard-Carlisle Historical-Genealogical Society (Dallas, TX: Taylor Publishing Company, 1993), pp. 19-20.
"Isaac T. Bodkin (1833-1907)," Find A Grave, Memorial 115334152, accessed January 5, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/115334152.
